purposes: In Search of Southeast  Asia Through the M+ Collections

labels.purpose: In Search of Southeast  Asia Through the M+ Collections
labels.text: Sopheap Pich’s return to Cambodia in 2002, after about twenty years in the United States, triggered a vital new direction in his art making, as he moved away from painting and began creating three-dimensional sculptures out of locally sourced bamboo and rattan. Working with local craftsmen, he devised a latticework method reminiscent of vernacular forms such as woven bamboo baskets and fish traps. Compound is unusual in Pich’s body of work in that it consists entirely of repeated geometric shapes as opposed to a single composition. It is also his first work to embrace a modular approach; the individual components can be endlessly rearranged and stacked in different configurations that change according to the display space. Following a conversation with the artist, M+ devised a special arrangement of the work for this exhibition, involving a portion of the total number of elements. Produced at a time when Pich’s home city of Phnom Penh was undergoing rapid urbanisation, the rectilinear forms of Compound serve as a poignant commentary on the constantly changing cityscape.

purposes: In Search of Southeast  Asia Through the M+ Collections

labels.purpose: In Search of Southeast  Asia Through the M+ Collections
labels.text: 2002 年，Sopheap Pich 從旅居 20 年的美國重返柬 埔寨。及後他開闢了藝術生涯的新路向，由繪畫轉 為選用本土出產的竹和藤來創作雕塑作品。他與當 地工匠合作，根據傳統竹籃和捕魚器具的形態， 自創格子編織法。相較於他的其他作品，《複合 物》的特別之處在於：它是由多件幾何形物件組 成，而非單一結構的作品。這亦是他首次以組 合的方式，按陳列空間將作品元件任意重組或重 疊，令作品形態變化萬千。 這次展出的裝置組合 形式只採用了整個裝置全部組件的一部分，是M+ 與藝術家討論後專為本展覽而構思。《 複合物》創 作之際，正值 Pich 故鄉金邊經歷急劇都市化。作 品所呈現的長形直線外觀組合，透露了藝術家對瞬 息萬變的城市景觀感觸至深。

medium.en: bamboo, rattan, plywood, and metal wire

images.Copyright: photo: courtesy the artist and Tyler Rollins Fine Art
images.AltText: Sculpture consisting of multiple woven bamboo and rattan shapes created with the help of metal wire, combined to create a large, castle-like structure.
images.AltTextTC: 外型恍如一座巨大城堡的雕塑，由多個以竹和藤加上金屬線編織而成的組件組成。
